profile:
Robert Redford Electrical Services is an electrical contracting company located in New Westminster, British Columbia. Our central location allows us to respond to your service needs more efficiently. We have years of experience in delivering electrical services to residential and commercial customers throughout the Lower Mainland. Our experience is in all aspects of electrical and has allowed us to deliver prompt and accurate quotes in a timely manner for your consideration.

Our electricians are experts in the essential electrical services required in our communities. Our main focus is to provide prompt and reliable service to our customers at a competitive price. Our electrical service coverage area is the entire Lower Mainland.

We are a Licenced, Bonded and an Insured company ensuring a standard of excellence to our customers. 

At Robert Redford Electrical Services we only have Certified Journeyman Electricians showing up at your door. Our electricians are specific to your needs, should you require an electrician for commercial applications we have electricians that work and specialize in that field; the same for our residential customers, we will send our electricians with years of experience in residential wiring.

Robert Redford Electrical Services will show you the respect you deserve and expect.

We give you a written quotation , to cover everything required for your specific installation, as well as the cost for installation so there are no surprises.

Our estimates are itemized so you know exactly what is included for your specific application.
We specialize in Knob and Tube rewiring of homes with little damage. We also do Electrical Service Upgrades, Renovations and Office Upgrades

profile:
Your Reno Crew is a full service interior/exterior renovation and maintenance company.  

Bathroom Renovations, Kitchen Planning & Renovations and Basement Renovations (including basement suite legalization) comprise the bulk of our projects.

However, as General Contractors and Project Managers, we also build Home Additions, which involve Demolition, Excavation, Foundation, Framing, Plumbing, Electrical, Floor Laying and Roofing.  

A recent addition to our product/service offering are Outdoor Living Spaces.  

The YardCave is a custom designed and built outdoor sheltered entertainment area incorporating BBQ, Audio & Visual, Lighting, Beverage Refrigerator, Ice Chest and Bradley Digital Smoker.
service_area: Langley, Surrey, White Rock, Abbotsford & Maple Ridge
services: Kitchen Renovations, Bathroom Renovations, Basement Renovations including legalization of Basement Suites, Additions, Decks and Outdoor Living Spaces, Tile Setting, Hardwood and Laminate installation, Carpet and Vinyl installation.

specialities: Outdoor Living Spaces featuring the YardCave

profile:
Blue Ocean Construction is an award-winning Residential and Commercial General Contracting Firm serving clients in the Vancouver and Lower Mainland areas.  Now in our 32nd year, at Blue Ocean Construction we’ll take the time to fully understand your requirements and provide you with the information to need to make an informed decision on your construction needs. With an open, friendly, and flexible working attitude, we provide professional detailed costing, scheduling, and project documentation.

***


As an accredited member of the Better Business Bureau for 20+ years, we’ve achieved an A+ rating.  We are a member of the Canadian Home Builder’s Association, and of Renomark.  Winner of multiple awards and accreditation's, we’re proud of our team, and our continuous commitment to excellence.
For further information and to view our photo gallery visit our website http://blueoceanconstruction.com/

***

We also provide interior renovation services through Home Depot, such as bathroom, and basement renovations.
service_area: As well as custom home builders in the Lower Mainland we provide renovation services for the Home Depot Interior Renovation Program in Vancouver & the Lower Mainland, Kamloops, the Okanagan (Westbank, Kelowna, Vernon), Calgary, Edmonton, Regina, and Saskatoon.   We also provide Painting services for the Vancouver, Fraser Valley, Okanagan, Regina and Saskatoon area Home Depot stores.
services:
Our services include residential, commercial and retail construction and renovations.  As licensed building envelope and building contractors we also provide building maintenance and envelope services to strata and cooperative associations.
Blue Ocean is a long standing Service Provider of Interior Renovations for over 10 of Western Canadian Home Depot stores.

- Commercial Construction
- Custom Home Building
- High Performance Builder
- Renovations

profile:
We offer an end-to-end client experience that includes seamless communication, budgeting, staffing, on-site organization, and solid, quality work every time. Our past projects include new luxury residential construction, renovations, restorations and commercial tenant improvements. Occupied and fully operational job sites are never a problem. And we can also plan, manage, and build multi-phase jobs. 

In order to succeed in the construction industry, a general contractor must integrate superior craftsmanship, experience, and dedication within the company’s culture. But a contractor is only as good as his team — and we are committed to hiring experienced professionals who share in our commitment to quality.

We believe that teamwork, integrity, honesty, and attention to detail each step of the way, makes the best construction environment for everyone — which ultimately leads to greater customer satisfaction.

profile:
We are a company specialized in serving every interior need. Since 2004, we have been serving the entire Lower Mainland doing residential, commercial and renovation projects.
RESIDENTIAL
We provide interior drywall finishes for all your different residential projects: custom homes, new developments, multi-family developments, etc.
COMMERCIAL
We do commercial steel frame for all the needs of your project. Medical offices, gas stations, restaurants, commercial kitchens, corporate offices. etc.
RENOVATIONS
Our team can help you with all your renovation needs, from planning to finishing your project.
